title: The Unborn: Guardian
description: Just days before Christmas 2011, a Manhattan vagrant is found dead. Little does anyone realize that soon, his predictions of pending judgment will become real. Savage murders throughout the city eventually cause a lockdown of Manhattan, while those closest to the investigation begin to uncover facts pointing to the predictions of the deceased homeless man. The body count rises and terror grips the city. CSI Agent Ross Howard is summoned to unravel this mystery. What he finds will shock the world!
author: Donald Simmons
